Question
========

One tests H~1~: p = 0.4 against H~2~: p = 0.1 in a random sample of n = 10 observations. Testing quantity is the binomially distributed stochast B, the number of successes in the sample. As the left critical limit, the value 1 is used. The discernment power 1 - Î² is then equal to

----------

* 0.89
* 0.95
* 0.96

Solution
========

Answerlist

* 0.89: Incorrect
